definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be weighty, judicious, commanding (Ar. razuna be weighty, grave, firm of judgement; NH [[רוֹזֵן]] = BH, so [[רוזנים]] Sir 44:4);—only

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pt. pl. as subst., rulers, potentates, ‖[[מְלָכִים ]]: [[רׂזְנִים]] Ju Jdg 5:3, Hb Hab 1:10, ´[[רוֹ]]: Ps 2:2, Pr 8:15, Pr 31:4, ‖[[שׁׂפְטֵי אֶרֶץ ]] Is 40:23.
